galaxies.name: Milky Way Galaxy
galaxies.contents: 10,000,000 White Dwarfs, 1,000,000,000 Neutron Stars, 100,000,000 Black Holes and you

galaxies.name: Canis Major Dwarf
galaxies.distance: Distance: 0.025 Million Light Years from Earth
galaxies.contents: 1,000,000,000 Stars(wants to be the Milky Way so bad)

galaxies.name: Virgo Stellar Stream
galaxies.distance: Distance: 0.030 Million Light Years from Earth
galaxies.contents: In the process of being 'cannibalised' by the Milky Way, so sad too bad

galaxies.name: Sagittarius Dwarf Eliptical Galaxy
galaxies.distance: Distance: 0.081 Million Light Years from Earth

galaxies.name: Large Magellanic Cloud
galaxies.distance: Distance: 0.163 Million Light Years from Earth
galaxies.contents: 400 Planetary Nebulae(gas ejected from late stage Red Giant Stars), 60 Globular Clusters and 700 Open Clusters

galaxies.name: Small Magellanic Cloud
galaxies.distance: Distance: 0.197 Million Light Years from Earth
galaxies.contents: Several hundred million stars and approximately 7 billion solar masses
